ygData.subject: Aradune!
ygData.msgSnippet: This is about the coolest thing thats happened to me in a while. At the festival on Fennin Ro, I saw aradune! He was standing there and watching the tourney
ygData.messageBody:
This is about the coolest thing thats happened to me in a while. At the festival on Fennin Ro, I saw aradune! He was standing there and watching the tourney going on. I think the coolest thing by far was the fact that I talked to him, and he answered me back. Anyone else on Fennin Ro that saw him? Well I just thought Id add that cause I thought that it was pretty cool.

Baian
Bard of Fennin Ro and the 19th song.
Master Cooker and Apprentice Potterer
